About Piraeus

Athens' historic port city. Perfect for early ferry departures to the islands. Seafood restaurants along the marina and authentic Greek atmosphere.

MaritimeAuthenticPractical
Best for: Island hoppers, Seafood lovers, Budget travelers

FAQs: Staying in Piraeus

Is Piraeus a good area to stay in Athens?

Yes! Piraeus is athens' historic port city. It's especially good for island hoppers, seafood lovers, budget travelers.

How far is Piraeus from the Acropolis?

Piraeus is 30 min (metro) walk from the Acropolis. Most hotels in Piraeus are within easy walking distance of the Acropolis and other major attractions.

What's the average hotel price in Piraeus?

Hotels in Piraeus average around â‚¬85 per night. You can find options ranging from budget hostels to luxury hotels depending on your preferences.
